Plot: Constantine tells the story of irreverent supernatural detective John Constantine, who has literally been to hell and back.
Title: Constantine
Writer: Jamie Delano (comic book "Hellblazer"), Garth Ennis (comic book "Hellblazer"), Kevin Brodbin (story), Kevin Brodbin (screenplay), Frank A. Cappello (screenplay)
Actors: Keanu Reeves, Rachel Weisz, Shia LaBeouf, Djimon Hounsou
tomatoConsensus: Despite solid production values and an intriguing premise, Constantine lacks the focus of another spiritual shoot-em-up, The Matrix.
